default.Disease: Diseases defined in medicine, such as covid-19, myocarditis, etc.
default.Phenotype: clinical symptoms in the disease, such as fever, cough, chest tightness, etc.
default.Drug: specific compound drugs or traditional Chinese medicine used for disease treatment, such as: redcivir, Lianhua Qingwen capsule, etc.
default.ChemicalCompound: chemical element used in the synthesis of drugs.
default.Gene: nucleotide sequence, such as ACE2, etc
default.Virus: some microorganisms causing diseases, such as sars-cov-2, SARS, etc.
default.Organization: Human organs, such as heart, brain, lung, kidney, etc
default.Chemical: Chemicals, products made through the chemical industry
